home.name: I'm Júlia Luelmo.
home.intro: Graduated in Advertising and Public Relations from Universitat Pompeu Fabra, with a specialization in Public Relations. Experienced in corporate communication and coordination of campaigns and events. Passionate about effective communication and the creation of clear and strategic content. Seeking opportunities to apply and further develop my skills in corporate environments.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I have worked for over a year as a communications manager in a legal consultancy, managing clients’ digital communication in a comprehensive way. My main responsibilities included writing and publishing professional content on LinkedIn, updating corporate websites in WordPress, implementing SEO improvements and content optimization, coordinating with clients and resolving inquiries, as well as using office and digital tools for document management.
about.paragraph2: Additionally, I have experience managing social media for various projects, creating strategic content and planning posts to maintain a consistent online presence. I am motivated to work in dynamic and collaborative environments, contributing clarity, organization, and efficiency to every project, while continuing to develop my skills in corporate and digital communication.

dealTaxLegal.description: At Deal Tax & Legal, I was responsible for the comprehensive management of the clients’ digital communication. My tasks included writing and publishing professional content on LinkedIn, updating corporate websites through WordPress, and implementing SEO improvements to optimize content and increase online visibility. I also coordinated directly with clients to address communication needs or questions, and used various office and digital tools for document management.

diariBarcelona.description: At Diari de Barcelona, I was in charge of planning and publishing digital content on the newspaper’s social media platforms, adapting the messages to the brand’s tone and style. I also monitored and analyzed engagement data to assess the performance of publications and improve the social media communication strategy.

eventsHostess.description: I was responsible for providing customer service and logistical support during events, ensuring a positive experience for attendees. I also carried out control tasks and basic coordination with the organizing teams to ensure the smooth running of each activity.

tfg.title: Bachelor's Thesis · Sexual Health Campaign
tfg.description: Sexual health communication campaign in collaboration with CJAS and Share Festival Barcelona, as part of the Response-UPF programme. Designed and implemented an STI awareness initiative featuring real testing at the festival, plus a custom ChatGPT tool for CJAS to provide innovative information and support.

natGeo.title: Editorial Design · National Geographic Inspired Magazine
natGeo.description: Collaborative editorial project inspired by National Geographic's aesthetic and style for the Graphic Design course. Created layout, typography, photography, and content using professional editing tools to deliver a visually coherent and compelling publication.

protocolo.title: Event Protocol · UPF 35th Anniversary Simulation
protocolo.description: Simulated institutional event organisation celebrating Universitat Pompeu Fabra's 35th anniversary for the Protocol course. Designed the event concept, planned logistics, and managed budget constraints while ensuring alignment with university identity and protocol standards.

estrella.title: Audio Advertising · Estrella Damm Podcast Concept
estrella.description: Brand analysis and podcast concept development for Estrella Damm as part of the Audio Advertising course. Evaluated positioning, target audience, and existing communication to design an engaging podcast format, including scriptwriting and planning the first episode.
